Samples.Name: TextToolbar
Samples.About: A Toolbar for Editing Text attached to a RichEditBox. It can format RTF and Markdown, or use a Custom Formatter, and specify your own Formatter with Buttons and Actions.

Samples.Name: TabView
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: Please migrate to the TabView control from WinUI, this control will be removed in a future release. https://aka.ms/winui
Samples.About: A control for displaying multiple items in the same space and allows a user to easily switch between them.

Samples.Name: DataGrid
Samples.About: Control that presents data in a customizable table of rows and columns.

Samples.Name: Carousel
Samples.About: Presents items in a carousel control. It reacts to changes in the layout as well as the content so it can adapt to different form factors automatically.

Samples.Name: AdaptiveGridView
Samples.About: Presents items in a evenly-spaced set of columns to fill the total available display space. It reacts to changes in the layout as well as the content so it can adapt to different form factors automatically.

Samples.Name: UniformGrid
Samples.About: Presents items in a evenly-spaced set of rows or columns to fill the total available display space. It reacts to changes in the layout as well as the content so it can adapt to different form factors automatically.

Samples.Name: RangeSelector
Samples.About: The RangeSelector is a "double slider" control for range values.

Samples.Name: ImageEx
Samples.About: Images are downloaded asynchronously showing a load indicator. Source images are then stored in the App local cache to preserve resources and load time.

Samples.Name: HeaderedTextBlock
Samples.About: The HeaderedTextBlock control is designed to provide a header for read only text. This control is useful for displaying read only forms.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The HeaderedTextBlock has been replaced with the HeaderedContentControl and will be removed in a future major release.

Samples.Name: MasterDetailsView
Samples.About: The MasterDetailsView control allows the user to implement the Master/Details design pattern.

Samples.Name: MarkdownTextBlock
Samples.About: An efficient and extensible control that can parse and render markdown.

Samples.Name: RadialGauge
Samples.About: The radial gauge displays a value within a range, using a needle on a circular face.

Samples.Name: RadialProgressBar
Samples.About: The radial progress bar displays progress as a circle getting filled.

Samples.Name: RotatorTile
Samples.About: RotatorTile is an ItemsControl that rotates through a set of items one-by-one. It enables you to show multiple items of data in a live-tile like way.

Samples.Name: BladeView
Samples.About: BladeView provides a horizontal collection of blades for master-detail scenarios. The control is based on the experience demonstrated by the Azure Portal.

Samples.Name: ScrollHeader
Samples.About: A UI control that works as a ListView or GridView header control with quick return, sticky and fade behavior.

Samples.Name: GridSplitter
Samples.About: GridSplitter represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a Grid control.

Samples.Name: DropShadowPanel
Samples.About: DropShadowPanel contol allows the creation of a DropShadow for any Xaml FrameworkElement in markup.

Samples.Name: Loading
Samples.About: LoadingControl helps to show content with animation to the user while the app is doing some calculation.

Samples.Name: Expander
Samples.About: Expander control allows user to show/hide content based on a boolean state.

Samples.Name: TileControl
Samples.About: A ContentControl that show an image repeated many times.The control can be synchronized with a Scrollviewer and animated easily

Samples.Name: WrapPanel
Samples.About: The WrapPanel Control positions child elements in sequential position from left to right, breaking content to the next line at the edge of the containing box.

Samples.Name: WrapLayout
Samples.About: The WrapLayout virtualizes child elements in sequential position from left to right, breaking content to the next line at the edge of the containing box.

Samples.Name: OrbitView
Samples.About: The OrbitView Control positions items in a circle around a center element and supports orbits and anchors.

Samples.Name: Menu
Samples.About: This control will be removed in a future major release. Please use the MenuBar control from the WinUI Library instead.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: This control will be removed in a future major release. Please use the MenuBar control from the WinUI Library instead.

Samples.Name: InAppNotification
Samples.About: The In App Notification control offers the ability to show local notifications in your application.

Samples.Name: DockPanel
Samples.About: Defines an area where you can arrange child elements either horizontally or vertically, relative to each other.

Samples.Name: HeaderedContentControl
Samples.About: Allows content to be displayed with a specified header.

Samples.Name: HeaderedItemsControl
Samples.About: Allows items to be displayed with a specified header.

Samples.Name: StaggeredPanel
Samples.About: The StaggeredPanel allows for layout of items in a column approach where an item will be added to whichever column has used the least amount of space.

Samples.Name: StaggeredLayout
Samples.About: The StaggeredLayout virtualizes items in a column approach where an item will be added to whichever column has used the least amount of space.

Samples.Name: LayoutTransformControl
Samples.About: Control that implements support for transformations as if applied by LayoutTransform.

Samples.Name: CameraPreview
Samples.About: Allows to easily preview video from available camera frame source groups and also get realtime video frames/ software bitmaps from the selected source.

Samples.Name: InfiniteCanvas
Samples.About: InfiniteCanvas is a canvas that supports Infinite Scrolling, Ink, Text, Format Text, Zoom in/out, Redo, Undo, Export canvas data, Import canvas data.

Samples.Name: RemoteDevicePicker
Samples.About: Remote Device Picker Control for Project Rome.

Samples.Name: ImageCropper
Samples.About: ImageCropper control allows user to crop image freely.

Samples.Name: Eyedropper
Samples.About: Eyedropper can pick up a color from anywhere in your application.

Samples.Name: LoginButton
Samples.About: The LoginButton control is a button and flyout to facilitate Microsoft identity platform authentication for AAD or MSA accounts.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The LoginButton control is in preview. Find out more here: https://aka.ms/wgt

Samples.Name: PersonView
Samples.About: The PersonView control is used to display a person or contact by using their photo, name, and/or email address from Microsoft Graph.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The PersonView control is in preview. Find out more here: https://aka.ms/wgt

Samples.Name: PeoplePicker
Samples.About: The PeoplePicker Control searchs for people and renders the list of results from Microsoft Graph. By default, the component will search for all people.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The PeoplePicker control is in preview. Find out more here: https://aka.ms/wgt

Samples.Name: AlignmentGrid
Samples.About: AlignmentGrid is used to display a grid to help aligning controls.

Samples.Name: FocusTracker
Samples.About: FocusTracker can be used to display information about the current focused XAML element.

Samples.Name: TokenizingTextBox
Samples.About: A text input control that makes suggestions and keeps track of data token items

Samples.Name: Fade
Samples.About: Opacity of XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Scale
Samples.About: Scale of XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Offset
Samples.About: Offset of XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Rotate
Samples.About: Rotation on XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Blur
Samples.About: Blur XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Saturation
Samples.About: Saturate XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Light
Samples.About: The Light effect will be removed in a future major release
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The Light effect will be removed in a future major release

Samples.Name: FadeHeader
Samples.About: Fade ListView and GridView Headers

Samples.Name: Lottie
Samples.About: Lottie-Windows is a library and tools for rendering Lottie animations on Windows 10.

Samples.Name: ReorderGridAnimation
Samples.About: Animates items of a grid when the size changes

Samples.Name: Implicit Animations
Samples.About: Attached properties to enable Implicit animations (including Show and Hide animations) through XAML

Samples.Name: Connected Animations
Samples.About: Attached properties to enable Connected animations through XAML

Samples.Name: WindowsXamlHost
Samples.About: This guide helps you add UWP XAML controls to your WPF

Samples.Name: WebView
Samples.About: The Windows Community Toolkit provides a version of the UWP web view control that can be used in WPF and Windows Forms applications. This control embeds a view into your application that renders web content using the Microsoft Edge rendering engine

Samples.Name: WebViewCompatible
Samples.About: The Windows Community Toolkit provides a version of the UWP web view control that can be used in WPF and Windows Forms applications. This control embeds a view into your application that renders web content in one of two ways. For client environments that support the WebViewControl (Windows 10), that implementation is used. For legacy systems, System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser implements the view

Samples.Name: InkCanvas
Samples.About: This control is a wrapper to enable use of the UWP InkCanvas control in Windows Forms or WPF

Samples.Name: InkToolbar
Samples.About: This control is a wrapper to enable use of the UWP InkToolbar control in Windows Forms or WPF

Samples.Name: MediaPlayerElement
Samples.About: This control is a wrapper to enable use of the UWP MediaPlayerElement control in Windows Forms or WPF

Samples.Name: MapControl
Samples.About: This control is a wrapper to enable use of the UWP MapControl control in Windows Forms or WPF

Samples.Name: Facebook Service
Samples.About: The Facebook Service allows you to retrieve or publish data to Facebook graph.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The underlying library, winsdkfb, which the FacebookService relies on is not currently maintained.

Samples.Name: Microsoft Graph Service
Samples.About: These providers help you easily authenticate and connect to the Microsoft Graph.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The Graph Providers are in preview. Find out more here: https://aka.ms/wgt

Samples.Name: Twitter Service
Samples.About: The Twitter Service allows you to retrieve or publish data to Twitter.

Samples.Name: Weibo Service
Samples.About: The Weibo Service allows you to retrieve or publish data to Weibo.

Samples.Name: OneDrive Service
Samples.About: The OneDrive service allows you to get your files from OneDrive using an Microsoft Account or OneDrive For Business using an Office 365 account
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: Please use the Microsoft Graph SDK or our new providers at https://aka.ms/wgt

Samples.Name: LinkedIn Service
Samples.About: The LinkedIn service allows you to connect to retrieve or publish data to LinkedIn.

Samples.Name: Microsoft Translator Service
Samples.About: The Microsoft Translator Service allows you to translate text into many languages.

Samples.Name: ImageCache
Samples.About: The ImageCache allows persistence of images with an option to use in-memory storage.

Samples.Name: Object Storage
Samples.About: The Object Storage helper allows you to easily read and save objects in your application, both locally or on every device (roaming).

Samples.Name: Incremental Loading Collection
Samples.About: Allows to create collections that can be loaded incrementally, as user requests more items in the view. This type of collections can be bound to controls like GridView and ListView.

Samples.Name: BackgroundTaskHelper
Samples.About: Allows easy registration and maintenance of background task

Samples.Name: NetworkHelper
Samples.About: The NetworkHelper class is used to determine whether the app has Internet, and if it is on a metered Internet connection

Samples.Name: BluetoothLEHelper
Samples.About: The Bluetooth LE helper class is used to connect and interact with bluetooth LE devices.

Samples.Name: SystemInformation
Samples.About: The SystemInformation class provides easy access to some of system/app/device information

Samples.Name: PrintHelper
Samples.About: Allows to easily print XAML controls

Samples.Name: DispatcherQueueHelper
Samples.About: Allows easy interaction with Windows Runtime message dispatcher queue for multi-threaded scenario (I.E: Run code on UI thread).

Samples.Name: AdvancedCollectionView
Samples.About: Allows you to easily sort and filter your collections before displaying them.

Samples.Name: ObservableGroup
Samples.About: Allows you to easily create observable grouped collections.

Samples.Name: CameraHelper
Samples.About: Allows to easily get camera frame sources available for media capture to preview video and get real time video frames/software bitmaps.

Samples.Name: ThemeListener
Samples.About: The ThemeListener allows you to keep track of changes to the System Theme.

Samples.Name: RemoteDeviceHelper
Samples.About: Allows you to easily enumerate remote devices ( Project Rome ).

Samples.Name: ViewportBehavior
Samples.About: Behavior for listening element enter or exit viewport

Samples.Name: Markdown Parser
Samples.About: The Markdown Parser allows you to parse a Markdown String into a Markdown Document, and then Render it with a Markdown Renderer.

Samples.Name: RSS Parser
Samples.About: The RSS Parser allows you to parse an RSS content String into RSS Schema.

Samples.Name: LiveTile
Samples.About: This shows how to update a Live Tile with a rich Adaptive notification.

Samples.Name: Toast
Samples.About: This shows how to send a Toast notification.

Samples.Name: WeatherLiveTileAndToast
Samples.About: This shows how to send a Weather Live Tile and Toast notification, displaying the forecast.

Samples.Name: Guard APIs
Samples.About: The Guard APIs can be used to validate method arguments in a streamlined manner, which is also faster, less verbose, more expressive and less error prone than manually writing checks and throwing exceptions.

Samples.Name: High Performance APIs
Samples.About: The High Performance package contains a set of APIs that are heavily focused on optimization. All the new APIs have been carefully crafted to achieve the best possible performance when using them, either through reduced memory allocation, micro-optimizations at the assembly level, or by structuring the APIs in a way that facilitates writing performance oriented code in general.

Samples.Name: PlatformSpecificAnalyzer
Samples.About: Platform Specific Analyzer is a Roslyn analyzer that analyzes and suggests code fixes to ensure that any version / platform specific API are guarded by correct runtime checks

Samples.Name: CompareStateTrigger
Samples.About: Enables a state if the value is equal to, greater than, or less than another value

Samples.Name: IsEqualStateTrigger
Samples.About: Enables a state if the value is equal to another value

Samples.Name: FullScreenModeStateTrigger
Samples.About: Trigger for switching when in full screen mode

Samples.Name: IsNullOrEmptyStateTrigger
Samples.About: Enables a state if an Object is null or a String/IEnumerable is empty

Samples.Name: NetworkConnectionStateTrigger
Samples.About: Trigger for switching when the network availability changes

Samples.Name: IsNotEqualStateTrigger
Samples.About: Enables a state if the value is not equal to another value

Samples.Name: RegexStateTrigger
Samples.About: Enables a state if the regex expression is true for a given string value

Samples.Name: UserHandPreferenceStateTrigger
Samples.About: Trigger for switching UI based on whether the user favours their left or right hand.

Samples.Name: UserInteractionModeStateTrigger
Samples.About: Trigger for switching when the User interaction mode changes (tablet mode)

Samples.Name: BackdropBlurBrush
Samples.About: Brush which fills the contents with a blurred version of whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: BackdropInvertBrush
Samples.About: Brush which fills the contents with an inverted version of whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: BackdropGammaTransferBrush
Samples.About: Brush which fills the contents with a gamma modified version of whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: BackdropSaturationBrush
Samples.About: Brush which applies a Saturation effect to whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: BackdropSepiaBrush
Samples.About: Brush which applies a Sepia effect to whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: ImageBlendBrush
Samples.About: Brush which applies a blending effect a given image from whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: RadialGradientBrush
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: Please migrate to the RadialGradientBrush control from WinUI, this control will be removed in a future release. https://aka.ms/winui
Samples.About: A composition brush which creates a radial gradient effect.

Samples.Name: PipelineBrush
Samples.About: A composition brush which can render any custom Win2D/Composition effects chain.

Samples.Name: AcrylicBrush
Samples.About: A composition brush that provides a custom implementation of the official acrylic brush.

Samples.Name: TilesBrush
Samples.About: A composition brush that provides the ability to display a repeated image on its render surface.

Samples.Name: ListViewExtensions
Samples.About: Extensions for all controls that inherit from ListViewBase like ListView.

Samples.Name: ViewExtensions
Samples.About: View extensions to set StatusBar and TitleBar properties.

Samples.Name: TextBoxMask
Samples.About: TextBox Mask property allows a user to more easily enter fixed width text in TextBox control where you would like them to enter the data in a certain format

Samples.Name: Mouse
Samples.About: Mouse.Cursor attached property enables you to easily change the mouse cursor over specific Framework elements.

Samples.Name: TextBoxRegex
Samples.About: TextBoxRegex helps developer to validate a TextBox with a regular expression using the Regex property.

Samples.Name: SurfaceDialTextbox
Samples.About: Enables support for Surface Dial on any given Textbox. Rotate the Dial to change the numeric value of the Textbox.

Samples.Name: Visual Extensions
Samples.About: Attached properties to modify object visual properties through XAML

Samples.Name: FrameworkElementExtensions
Samples.About: Extensions for all the FrameworkElement controls.

Samples.Name: ClipToBounds
Samples.About: Extension to clip the UIElement inner controls inside its bounds.

Samples.Name: StringExtensions
Samples.About: String Extensions to validate strings

Samples.Name: ScrollViewerExtensions
Samples.About: Extensions for all controls that contain a ScrollViewer like ListView.

Samples.Name: OnDevice
Samples.About: The OnDevice markup extension allows you to customize UI appearance on a per-DeviceFamily basis.

Samples.Name: IconExtensions
Samples.About: Markup extensions to easily create various types of icons.

Samples.Name: GazeInteraction
Samples.About: Demonstrate the properties and events of the Gaze Interaction library

Samples.Name: GazeTracing
Samples.About: Shows how to use the Windows 10 API for eye trackers
